MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the CW5 postcode area of Nantwich, affecting properties in School Lane and surrounding streets.  We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6.26AM.  In order to complete repairs, engineers on site needed to isolate the power to other properties and we expect the power to be restored by 2.30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11.40AM on 8th November 2020.
